DIY Oven Mitts: Cut the rubber gloves into circles and sew them together to create a simple and effective oven mitt.
Artistic Canvas: Paint on rubber gloves to create unique wearable art pieces or wall hangings.
Kitchen Cleaning Gloves: Use rubber gloves to protect your hands from hot water, grease, and harsh cleaning chemicals while washing dishes or cleaning appliances.
Pet Toys: Clean and sanitize rubber gloves, then cut them into strips to create chew toys for dogs.
Gardening Gloves: Use rubber gloves to protect your hands from thorny plants, insect bites, and other gardening hazards.
